replacements.options={{ once: \"Allow once\", always:: options={{ once: "允许一次 (Allow once)", always: "始终允许 (Allow always)", reject: "拒绝 (Reject)" }}
replacements.title=\"Continue after repeated failures: title="连续失败后继续 (Continue after repeated failures)"
replacements.\"This will allow \" + props.request.per: "这将允许 (This will allow) " + props.request.permission + " 直到OpenCode重启 (until OpenCode is restarted)。"
replacements.This will allow the following patterns u: 这将允许以下模式，直到 OpenCode 重启 (This will allow the following patterns until OpenCode is restarted)
replacements.<text fg={theme.textMuted}>Tell OpenCode: <text fg={theme.textMuted}>告诉OpenCode如何处理 (Tell OpenCode what to do differently)</text>
replacements.Access external directory: 访问外部目录 (Access external directory)
